function.name: goo_canvas_item_skew_x
function.description: Skews the item's coordinate system along the x axis by the given amount, about the given origin.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the skew angle.

parameter.name: cx
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

parameter.name: cy
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_skew_y
function.description: Skews the item's coordinate system along the y axis by the given amount, about the given origin.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the skew angle.

parameter.name: cx
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

parameter.name: cy
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_render
function.description: Renders all or part of a canvas to the given cairo context.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: the area to render, or %NULL to render the entire canvas.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the scale to compare with each item's visibility threshold to see if they should be rendered. This only affects items that have their visibility set to %GOO_CANVAS_ITEM_VISIBLE_ABOVE_THRESHOLD.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_get_parent
function.description: Gets the parent of the style.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

function.return: the parent of the given style, or %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_child_properties_valist
function.description: Sets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: var_args
parameter.parameter_description: pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_antialias_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard antialias property.

function.name: goo_canvas_points_new
function.description: Creates a new #GooCanvasPoints struct with space for the given number of points. It should be freed with goo_canvas_points_unref().

parameter.name: num_points
parameter.parameter_description: the number of points to create space for.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_transform
function.description: Gets the transformation matrix of an item.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: transform
parameter.parameter_description: the place to store the transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_allocate_area
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically layout items such as #GooCanvasTable.
It allocates an area to a child #GooCanvasItem.
Note that the parent layout item will use a transform to move each of its children for the layout, so there is no need for the child item to reposition itself. It only needs to recalculate its device bounds.
To help recalculate the item's device bounds, the @x_offset and @y_offset of the child item's allocated position from its requested position are provided. Simple items can just add these to their bounds.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: requested_area
parameter.parameter_description: the area that the item originally requested, in the parent's coordinate space.

parameter.name: allocated_area
parameter.parameter_description: the area that the item has been allocated, in the parent's coordinate space.

parameter.name: x_offset
parameter.parameter_description: the x offset of the allocated area from the requested area in the device coordinate space.

parameter.name: y_offset
parameter.parameter_description: the y offset of the allocated area from the requested area in the device coordinate space.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_child_properties
function.description: Gets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: pairs of property names and value pointers, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_line_cap_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard line cap property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_rotate
function.description: Rotates the item's coordinate system by the given amount, about the given origin.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the clockwise angle of rotation.

parameter.name: cx
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the rotation.

parameter.name: cy
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the rotation.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_item

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

function.return: the canvas item corresponding to the given #GooCanvasItemModel, or %NULL if no canvas item has been created for it yet.

function.name: goo_canvas_unregister_item
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items.
It should be called in the finalize method of #GooCanvasItem objects, to remove the canvas item from the #GooCanvas's hash table.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: the item model whose canvas item is being finalized.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_update
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically container items such as #GooCanvasGroup.
Updates the item, if needed, and any children.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: entire_tree
parameter.parameter_description: if the entire subtree should be updated.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasBounds to return the new bounds in.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_raise
function.description: Raises a model in the stacking order.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: above
parameter.parameter_description: the item model to raise @model above, or %NULL to raise @model to the top of the stack.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_paint
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically container items such as #GooCanvasGroup.
It paints the item and all children if they intersect the given bounds.
Note that the @scale argument may be different to the current scale in the #GooCanvasItem, e.g. when the canvas is being printed.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: the bounds that need to be repainted.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the scale to use to determine whether an item should be painted. See #GooCanvasItem:visibility-threshold.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_rotate
function.description: Rotates the model's coordinate system by the given amount, about the given origin.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the clockwise angle of rotation.

parameter.name: cx
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the rotation.

parameter.name: cy
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the rotation.

function.name: goo_canvas_path_model_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: path_data
parameter.parameter_description: the sequence of path commands, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the <ulink url="http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/">Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)</ulink> path element.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_create_path
function.description: Creates the path specified by the given #GooCanvasPathCommand array.

parameter.name: commands
parameter.parameter_description: an array of #GooCanvasPathCommand.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_paint_path
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple.
It paints the current path, using the item's style settings.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

function.name: goo_canvas_unregister_widget_item
function.description:
This function should only be used by #GooCanvasWidget and subclass implementations.
It unregisters a widget item from the canvas, when the item is no longer in the canvas.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: witem
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasWidget item.

function.name: GooCanvas
function.description:
This is emitted when a new canvas item is created, in model/view mode.
Applications can set up signal handlers for the new items here.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: the canvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the new item.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: the item's model.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_set_fill_options
function.description: Sets the standard cairo fill options using the given style.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

function.return: %TRUE if a paint source is set, or %FALSE if the fill should be skipped.

function.name: goo_canvas_keyboard_ungrab
function.description: Ungrabs the keyboard, if the given item has the keyboard grab.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item that has the keyboard grab.

parameter.name: time
parameter.parameter_description: the time of the event that lead to the keyboard ungrab. This should come from the relevant #GdkEvent.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_transform
function.description: Gets the transformation matrix of an item model.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: transform
parameter.parameter_description: the place to store the transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_child_property
function.description: Gets a child property of @child.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: property_name
parameter.parameter_description: the name of the child property to get.

parameter.name: value
parameter.parameter_description: a location to return the value.

function.name: goo_canvas_points_ref
function.description: Increments the reference count of the given #GooCanvasPoints struct.

parameter.name: points
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasPoints struct.

function.name: goo_canvas_widget_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: widget
parameter.parameter_description: the widget.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the item.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the item.

parameter.name: width
parameter.parameter_description: the width of the item, or -1 to use the widget's requested width.

parameter.name: height
parameter.parameter_description: the height of the item, or -1 to use the widget's requested height.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_line_join_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard line join property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_raise
function.description: Raises an item in the stacking order.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: above
parameter.parameter_description: the item to raise @item above, or %NULL to raise @item to the top of the stack.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_stop_animation
function.description: Stops any current animation for the given item, leaving it at its current position.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

function.name: goo_canvas_text_model_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: string
parameter.parameter_description: the text to display.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the text.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the text.

parameter.name: width
parameter.parameter_description: the width of the text item, or -1 for unlimited width.

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.parameter_description: the position of the text relative to the given @x and @y coordinates. For example an anchor of %GDK_ANCHOR_NW will result in the top-left of the text being placed at the given @x and @y coordinates. An anchor of %GDK_ANCHOR_CENTER will result in the center of the text being placed at the @x and @y coordinates.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_line_width_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard line width property.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_set_stroke_options
function.description: Sets the standard cairo stroke options using the given style.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

function.return: %TRUE if a paint source is set, or %FALSE if the stroke should be skipped.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_fill_pattern_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard fill pattern property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_parent
function.description: Gets the parent of the given item.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

function.return: the parent item, or %NULL if the item has no parent.

function.name: goo_canvas_pointer_ungrab
function.description: Ungrabs the pointer, if the given item has the pointer grab.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item that has the grab.

parameter.name: time
parameter.parameter_description: the time of the event that lead to the pointer ungrab. This should come from the relevant #GdkEvent.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_ensure_updated
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items.
It updates the canvas immediately, if an update is scheduled. This ensures that all item bounds are up-to-date.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_changed
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple.
It is used as a callback for the "changed" signal of the item models. It requests an update or redraw of the item as appropriate.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: recompute_bounds
parameter.parameter_description: if the item's bounds need to be recomputed.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_animate
function.description: Animates a model from its current position to the given offsets, scale and rotation.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the final x coordinate.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the final y coordinate.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the final scale.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the final rotation. This can be negative to rotate anticlockwise, and can also be greater than 360 to rotate a number of times.

parameter.name: absolute
parameter.parameter_description: if the @x, @y, @scale and @degrees values are absolute, or relative to the current transform. Note that absolute animations only work if the model currently has a simple transform. If the model has a shear or some other complicated transform it may result in strange animations.

parameter.name: duration
parameter.parameter_description: the duration of the animation, in milliseconds (1/1000ths of a second).

parameter.name: step_time
parameter.parameter_description: the time between each animation step, in milliseconds.

parameter.name: type
parameter.parameter_description: specifies what happens when the animation finishes.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_animate
function.description: Animates an item from its current position to the given offsets, scale and rotation.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the final x coordinate.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the final y coordinate.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the final scale.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the final rotation. This can be negative to rotate anticlockwise, and can also be greater than 360 to rotate a number of times.

parameter.name: absolute
parameter.parameter_description: if the @x, @y, @scale and @degrees values are absolute, or relative to the current transform. Note that absolute animations only work if the item currently has a simple transform. If the item has a shear or some other complicated transform it may result in strange animations.

parameter.name: duration
parameter.parameter_description: the duration of the animation, in milliseconds (1/1000ths of a second).

parameter.name: step_time
parameter.parameter_description: the time between each animation step, in milliseconds.

parameter.name: type
parameter.parameter_description: specifies what happens when the animation finishes.

function.name: goo_canvas_convert_to_item_space
function.description: Converts a coordinate from the canvas coordinate space to the given item's coordinate space, applying all transformation matrices including the item's own transformation matrix, if it has one.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the x coordinate to convert.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the y coordinate to convert.

function.name: goo_canvas_create_item
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, typically container items such as #GooCanvasGroup.
It creates a new canvas item for the given item model, and recursively creates items for any children.
It uses the create_item() virtual method if it has been set. Subclasses of #GooCanvas can define this method if they want to use custom views for items.
It emits the #GooCanvas::item-created signal after creating the view, so application code can connect signal handlers to the new view if desired.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: the item model to create a canvas item for.

function.name: goo_canvas_scroll_to
function.description: Scrolls the canvas, placing the given point as close to the top-left of the view as possible.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: left
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate to scroll to.

parameter.name: top
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate to scroll to.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_remove
function.description:
Removes a model from its parent. If the model is in a canvas it will be removed.
This would normally also result in the model being freed.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

function.name: goo_canvas_request_update
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvas or #GooCanvasItem implementations.
It schedules an update of the #GooCanvas. This will be performed in the idle loop, after all pending events have been handled, but before the canvas has been repainted.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_child_properties
function.description: Sets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_scale
function.description:
Gets the current scale of the canvas.
The scale specifies the magnification factor of the canvas, e.g. if an item has a width of 2 pixels and the scale is set to 3, it will be displayed with a width of 2 x 3 = 6 pixels.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_parent
function.description: Gets the parent of the given model.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

function.return: the parent model, or %NULL if the model has no parent.

function.name: goo_canvas_set_root_item_model
function.description:
Sets the root item model of the canvas.
A hierarchy of canvas items will be created, corresponding to the hierarchy of items in the model. Any current canvas items will be removed.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_skew_y
function.description: Skews the model's coordinate system along the y axis by the given amount, about the given origin.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the skew angle.

parameter.name: cx
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

parameter.name: cy
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_is_container
function.description: Tests to see if the given item model is a container.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

function.return: %TRUE if the item model is a container.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_bounds
function.description:
Gets the bounds of the canvas, in canvas units.
By default, canvas units are pixels, though the #GooCanvas:units property can be used to change the units to points, inches or millimeters.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: left
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to a #gdouble to return the left edge, or %NULL.

parameter.name: top
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to a #gdouble to return the top edge, or %NULL.

parameter.name: right
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to a #gdouble to return the right edge, or %NULL.

parameter.name: bottom
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to a #gdouble to return the bottom edge, or %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_request_update
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items.
It requests that an update of the item is scheduled. It will be performed as soon as the application is idle, and before the canvas is redrawn.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_child_properties
function.description: Gets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: pairs of property names and value pointers, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_root_item
function.description: Gets the root item of the canvas, usually a #GooCanvasGroup.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.return: the root item, or %NULL if there is no root item.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_get_property
function.description:
Gets the value of a property.
This searches though all the #GooCanvasStyle's own list of property settings and also all ancestor #GooCanvasStyle objects.
Note that it returns a pointer to the internal #GValue setting, which should not be changed.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

parameter.name: property_id
parameter.parameter_description: the property identifier.

function.return: the property value, or %NULL if it isn't set.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_set_parent
function.description: Sets the parent of the style.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the new parent.

function.name: goo_canvas_table_model_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_parse_path_data
function.description: Parses the given SVG path specification string.

parameter.name: path_data
parameter.parameter_description: the sequence of path commands, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the <ulink url="http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/">Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)</ulink> path element.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_add_child
function.description: Adds a child item to a container item at the given stack position.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the container to add the item to.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: the item to add.

parameter.name: position
parameter.parameter_description: the position of the item, or -1 to place it last (at the top of the stacking order).

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_canvas
function.description: Returns: the #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_parent

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the new parent item.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_translate
function.description: Translates the origin of the model's coordinate system by the given amounts.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: tx
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to move the origin in the horizontal direction.

parameter.name: ty
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to move the origin in the vertical direction.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_child_property
function.description: Sets a child property of @child.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: property_name
parameter.parameter_description: the name of the child property to set.

parameter.name: value
parameter.parameter_description: the value to set the property to.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_is_visible
function.description:
Checks if the item is visible.
This entails checking the item's own visibility setting, as well as those of its ancestors.
Note that the item may be scrolled off the screen and so may not be actually visible to the user.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

function.name: GooCanvasItem
function.description: Emitted for each child property that has changed. The signal's detail holds the property name.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item that received the signal.

parameter.name: pspec
parameter.parameter_description: the #GParamSpec of the changed child property.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_set_property
function.description:
Sets a property in the style, replacing any current setting.
Note that this will override the property setting in ancestor #GooCanvasStyle objects.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

parameter.name: property_id
parameter.parameter_description: the property identifier.

parameter.name: value
parameter.parameter_description: the value of the property.

function.name: goo_canvas_convert_to_pixels
function.description:
Converts a coordinate from the canvas coordinate space to pixels.
The canvas coordinate space is specified in the call to goo_canvas_set_bounds().
The pixel coordinate space specifies pixels from the top-left of the entire canvas window, according to the current scale setting. See goo_canvas_set_scale().

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the x coordinate to convert.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the y coordinate to convert.

function.name: goo_canvas_new
function.description:
Creates a new #GooCanvas widget.
A #GooCanvasGroup is created automatically as the root item of the canvas, though this can be overriden with goo_canvas_set_root_item() or goo_canvas_set_root_item_model().

function.name: goo_canvas_rect_model_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the left of the rectangle.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the top of the rectangle.

parameter.name: width
parameter.parameter_description: the width of the rectangle.

parameter.name: height
parameter.parameter_description: the height of the rectangle.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_child_property
function.description: Sets a child property of @child.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: property_name
parameter.parameter_description: the name of the child property to set.

parameter.name: value
parameter.parameter_description: the value to set the property to.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_lower
function.description: Lowers an item in the stacking order.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: below
parameter.parameter_description: the item to lower @item below, or %NULL to lower @item to the bottom of the stack.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_bounds
function.description:
Gets the bounds of the item.
Note that the bounds includes the entire fill and stroke extents of the item, whether they are painted or not.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasBounds to return the bounds in.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_translate
function.description: Translates the origin of the item's coordinate system by the given amounts.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: tx
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to move the origin in the horizontal direction.

parameter.name: ty
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to move the origin in the vertical direction.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_is_container
function.description: Tests to see if the given item is a container.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

function.return: %TRUE if the item is a container.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_n_children
function.description: Gets the number of children of the container.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_simple_transform
function.description: A convenience function to set the item's transformation matrix.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the item's coordinate space.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the item's coordinate space.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the scale of the item.

parameter.name: rotation
parameter.parameter_description: the clockwise rotation of the item, in degrees.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_root_item_model
function.description: Gets the root item model of the canvas.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.return: the root item model, or %NULL if there is no root item model.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_transform_for_child
function.description: Gets the transformation matrix of an item combined with any special transform needed for the given child. These special transforms are used by layout items such as #GooCanvasTable.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child of @item.

parameter.name: transform
parameter.parameter_description: the place to store the transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_item_at
function.description: Gets the item at the given point.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the point.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the point

parameter.name: is_pointer_event
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if the "pointer-events" property of items should be used to determine which parts of the item are tested.

function.return: the item found at the given point, or %NULL if no item was found.

function.name: SECTION

parameter.name: Title
parameter.parameter_description: GooCanvas

parameter.name: Short_Description
parameter.parameter_description: the main canvas widget.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.parameter_description: the height of the rectangle.

function.description: Gets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

function.name: goo_canvas_grab_focus
function.description: Grabs the keyboard focus for the given item.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item to grab the focus.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_canvas
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically container items such as #GooCanvasGroup.
It sets the canvas of the item.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas

function.name: goo_canvas_keyboard_grab
function.description: Attempts to grab the keyboard for the given item.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item to grab the keyboard for.

parameter.name: owner_events
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if keyboard events for this application will be reported normally, or %FALSE if all keyboard events will be reported with respect to the grab item.

parameter.name: time
parameter.parameter_description: the time of the event that lead to the keyboard grab. This should come from the relevant #GdkEvent.

function.name: goo_canvas_text_get_natural_extents
function.description:
Gets the natural extents of the text, in the text item's coordinate space.
The final extents of the text may be different, if the text item is placed in a layout container such as #GooCanvasTable.

parameter.name: text
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasText.

parameter.name: ink_rect
parameter.parameter_description: the location to return the ink rect, or %NULL.

parameter.name: logical_rect
parameter.parameter_description: the location to return the logical rect, or %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_child_properties
function.description: Sets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_check_in_path
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple.
It checks if the given point is in the current path, using the item's style settings.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the point.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the point.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: pointer_events
parameter.parameter_description: specifies which parts of the path to check.

function.return: %TRUE if the given point is in the current path.

function.name: goo_canvas_path_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: path_data
parameter.parameter_description: the sequence of path commands, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the <ulink url="http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/">Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)</ulink> path element.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_convert_from_pixels
function.description:
Converts a coordinate from pixels to the canvas coordinate space.
The pixel coordinate space specifies pixels from the top-left of the entire canvas window, according to the current scale setting. See goo_canvas_set_scale().
The canvas coordinate space is specified in the call to goo_canvas_set_bounds().

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the x coordinate to convert.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the y coordinate to convert.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_class_find_child_property
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically layout container items such as #GooCanvasTable.
It finds a child property of a canvas item class by name.

parameter.name: iclass
parameter.parameter_description: a #GObjectClass

parameter.name: property_name
parameter.parameter_description: the name of the child property to find

function.return: the #GParamSpec of the child property or %NULL if @class has no child property with that name.

function.name: goo_canvas_ellipse_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: center_x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the center of the ellipse.

parameter.name: center_y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the center of the ellipse.

parameter.name: radius_x
parameter.parameter_description: the horizontal radius of the ellipse.

parameter.name: radius_y
parameter.parameter_description: the vertical radius of the ellipse.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_points_unref
function.description: Decrements the reference count of the given #GooCanvasPoints struct, freeing it if the reference count falls to zero.

parameter.name: points
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasPoints struct.

function.name: goo_canvas_update
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvas or #GooCanvasItem implementations.
It updates any items that need updating.
If the bounds of items change, they will request a redraw of the old and new bounds so the display is updated correctly.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_get_line_width
function.description: Gets the item's line width.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_class_install_child_property
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas item models, specifically layout container item models such as #GooCanvasTableModel.
It installs a child property on a canvas item class.

parameter.name: mclass
parameter.parameter_description: a #GObjectClass

parameter.name: property_id
parameter.parameter_description: the id for the property

parameter.name: pspec
parameter.parameter_description: the #GParamSpec for the property

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_requested_area
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically layout items such as #GooCanvasTable.
It gets the requested area of a child item.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: requested_area
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasBounds to return the requested area in, in the parent's coordinate space.

function.return: %TRUE if the item should be allocated space.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_user_bounds_to_parent
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their get_requested_area() method.
It converts the item's bounds to a bounding box in its parent's coordinate space. If the item has no transformation matrix set then no conversion is needed.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: the bounds of the item, in the item's coordinate space.

function.name: goo_canvas_group_new
function.description: Creates a new group item.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_child
function.description: Gets the child at the given stack position.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: child_num
parameter.parameter_description: the position of a child in the container's stack.

function.return: the child at the given stack position, or %NULL if @child_num is out of range.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_move_child
function.description: Moves a child item to a new stack position within the container.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a container item.

parameter.name: old_position
parameter.parameter_description: the current position of the child item.

parameter.name: new_position
parameter.parameter_description: the new position of the child item.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_model
function.description: Sets the model of the given canvas item.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_style
function.description: Gets the model's style. If the model doesn't have its own style it will return its parent's style.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_line_join_miter_limit_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard miter limit property.

function.name: goo_canvas_text_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: string
parameter.parameter_description: the text to display.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the text.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the text.

parameter.name: width
parameter.parameter_description: the width of the text item, or -1 for unlimited width.

parameter.name: anchor
parameter.parameter_description: the position of the text relative to the given @x and @y coordinates. For example an anchor of %GDK_ANCHOR_NW will result in the top-left of the text being placed at the given @x and @y coordinates. An anchor of %GDK_ANCHOR_CENTER will result in the center of the text being placed at the @x and @y coordinates.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_parent

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the new parent item model.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_find_child
function.description: Attempts to find the given child with the container's stack.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: the child to find.

function.return: the position of the given @child, or -1 if it isn't found.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_get_path_bounds
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their update() or get_requested_area() methods.
It calculates the bounds of the current path, using the item's style settings, and stores the results in the given #GooCanvasBounds struct.
The returned bounds contains the bounding box of the path in device space, converted to user space coordinates. To calculate the bounds completely in user space, use cairo_identity_matrix() to temporarily reset the current transformation matrix to the identity matrix.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: the #GooCanvasBounds struct to store the resulting bounding box.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_child
function.description: Gets the child item at the given stack position.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a container item.

parameter.name: child_num
parameter.parameter_description: the position of a child in the container's stack.

function.return: the child item at the given stack position, or %NULL if @child_num is out of range.

function.name: goo_canvas_table_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_set_scale
function.description:
Sets the scale of the canvas.
The scale specifies the magnification factor of the canvas, e.g. if an item has a width of 2 pixels and the scale is set to 3, it will be displayed with a width of 2 x 3 = 6 pixels.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the new scale setting.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_skew_x
function.description: Skews the model's coordinate system along the x axis by the given amount, about the given origin.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.parameter_description: the skew angle.

parameter.name: cx
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

parameter.name: cy
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the skew transform.

function.name: goo_canvas_set_root_item
function.description: Sets the root item of the canvas. Any existing canvas items are removed.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the root canvas item.

function.name: goo_canvas_line_dash_unref
function.description: Decrements the reference count of the dash pattern. If it falls to 0 it is freed.

parameter.name: dash
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasLineDash.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_default_line_width
function.description: Gets the default line width, which depends on the current units setting.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.return: the default line width of the canvas.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_line_dash_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard line dash property.

parameter.name: y2

parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: center_x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the center of the ellipse.

parameter.name: center_y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the center of the ellipse.

parameter.name: radius_x
parameter.parameter_description: the horizontal radius of the ellipse.

parameter.name: radius_y
parameter.parameter_description: the vertical radius of the ellipse.

parameter.name: Varargs

function.name: goo_canvas_polyline_new_line

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL.

parameter.name: x1
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the start of the line.

parameter.name: y1
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the start of the line.

parameter.name: x2
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the end of the line.

parameter.name: y2
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the end of the line.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_line_dash_newv
function.description: Creates a new dash pattern. Takes ownership of the @dashes vector.

parameter.name: num_dashes
parameter.parameter_description: the number of dashes and gaps in the pattern.

parameter.name: dashes
parameter.parameter_description: a g_new-allocated vector of doubles, the length of each dash and gap.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_font_desc_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard font description property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_scale
function.description: Scales the item's coordinate system by the given amounts.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: sx
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to scale the horizontal axis.

parameter.name: sy
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to scale the vertical axis.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_simple_transform
function.description: This function can be used to get the position, scale and rotation of an item, providing that the item has a simple transformation matrix (e.g. set with goo_canvas_item_set_simple_transform(), or using a combination of simple translate, scale and rotate operations). If the item has a complex transformation matrix the results will be incorrect.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: returns the x coordinate of the origin of the item's coordinate space.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: returns the y coordinate of the origin of the item's coordinate space.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: returns the scale of the item.

parameter.name: rotation
parameter.parameter_description: returns the clockwise rotation of the item, in degrees (0-360).

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_check_style
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their update() or get_requested_area() methods.
It ensures that the item's style is setup correctly. If the item has its own #GooCanvasStyle it makes sure the parent is set correctly. If it doesn't have its own style it uses the parent item's style.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_items_at
function.description: Gets all items at the given point.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the point.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the point

parameter.name: is_pointer_event
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if the "pointer-events" property of items should be used to determine which parts of the item are tested.

function.return: a list of items found at the given point, with the top item at the start of the list, or %NULL if no items were found. The list must be freed with g_list_free().

function.name: GooCanvasItemSimple
function.description: The sequence of commands describing the clip path of the item, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the <ulink url="http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/">Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)</ulink> path element.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_stroke_pattern_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard stroke pattern property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_transform
function.description: Sets the transformation matrix of an item.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: transform
parameter.parameter_description: the new transformation matrix, or %NULL to reset the transformation to the identity matrix.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_simple_transform
function.description: This function can be used to get the position, scale and rotation of an item model, providing that the model has a simple transformation matrix (e.g. set with goo_canvas_item_model_set_simple_transform(), or using a combination of simple translate, scale and rotate operations). If the model has a complex transformation matrix the results will be incorrect.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: returns the x coordinate of the origin of the model's coordinate space.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: returns the y coordinate of the origin of the model's coordinate space.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: returns the scale of the model.

parameter.name: rotation
parameter.parameter_description: returns the clockwise rotation of the model, in degrees (0-360).

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_get_child_properties_valist
function.description: Gets the values of one or more child properties of @child.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItemModel.

parameter.name: var_args
parameter.parameter_description: pairs of property names and value pointers, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_scale
function.description: Scales the model's coordinate system by the given amounts.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: sx
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to scale the horizontal axis.

parameter.name: sy
parameter.parameter_description: the amount to scale the vertical axis.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_transform
function.description: Sets the transformation matrix of an item model.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: transform
parameter.parameter_description: the new transformation matrix, or %NULL to reset the transformation to the identity matrix.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_add_child
function.description: Adds a child at the given stack position.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: the child to add.

parameter.name: position
parameter.parameter_description: the position of the child, or -1 to place it last (at the top of the stacking order).

function.name: goo_canvas_style_operator_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard operator property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_set_model
function.description: This function should be called by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple in their set_model() method.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: the model that @item will view.

function.name: goo_canvas_set_bounds
function.description:
Sets the bounds of the #GooCanvas, in canvas units.
By default, canvas units are pixels, though the #GooCanvas:units property can be used to change the units to points, inches or millimeters.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: left
parameter.parameter_description: the left edge.

parameter.name: top
parameter.parameter_description: the top edge.

parameter.name: right
parameter.parameter_description: the right edge.

parameter.name: bottom
parameter.parameter_description: the bottom edge.

function.name: goo_canvas_polyline_model_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: close_path
parameter.parameter_description: if the last point should be connected to the first.

parameter.name: num_points
parameter.parameter_description: the number of points in the polyline.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: the pairs of coordinates for each point in the line, followed by optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_request_redraw
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvas or #GooCanvasItem implementations.
Requests that the given bounds be redrawn.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: the bounds to redraw.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_remove_child
function.description: Removes the child item at the given position.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a container item.

parameter.name: child_num
parameter.parameter_description: the position of the child item to remove.

function.name: goo_canvas_register_widget_item
function.description:
This function should only be used by #GooCanvasWidget and subclass implementations.
It registers a widget item with the canvas, so that the canvas can do the necessary actions to move and resize the widget as needed.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: witem
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasWidget item.

function.name: goo_canvas_group_model_new
function.description: Creates a new group item.

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: GooCanvasPath
function.description: The sequence of path commands, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the <ulink url="http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/">Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)</ulink> path element.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_stop_animation
function.description: Stops any current animation for the given model, leaving it at its current position.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

function.name: goo_canvas_get_items_in_area
function.description: Gets a list of items inside or outside a given area.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: area
parameter.parameter_description: the area to compare with each item's bounds.

parameter.name: inside_area
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if items inside @area should be returned, or %FALSE if items outside @area should be returned.

parameter.name: allow_overlaps
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if items which are partly inside and partly outside should be returned.

parameter.name: include_containers
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if containers should be checked as well as normal items.

function.return: a list of items in the given area, or %NULL if no items are found. The list should be freed with g_list_free().

function.name: goo_canvas_line_dash_ref
function.description: Increments the reference count of the dash pattern.

parameter.name: dash
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasLineDash.

function.name: goo_canvas_image_model_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent model, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: pixbuf
parameter.parameter_description: the #GdkPixbuf containing the image data, or %NULL.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the image.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the image.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_simple_user_bounds_to_device
function.description:
This function is intended to be used by subclasses of #GooCanvasItemSimple, typically in their update() or get_requested_area() methods.
It converts the item's bounds to a bounding box in device space.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItemSimple.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: bounds
parameter.parameter_description: the bounds of the item, in the item's coordinate space.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_items_at
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically container items such as #GooCanvasGroup.
It gets the items at the given point.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the point.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the point.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo contect.

parameter.name: is_pointer_event
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if the "pointer-events" properties of items should be used to determine which parts of the item are tested.

parameter.name: parent_is_visible
parameter.parameter_description: %TRUE if the parent item is visible (which implies that all ancestors are also visible).

parameter.name: found_items
parameter.parameter_description: the list of items found so far.

function.return: the @found_items list, with any more found items added onto the start of the list, leaving the top item first.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_class_list_child_properties
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically layout container items such as #GooCanvasTable.
It returns all child properties of a canvas item class.

parameter.name: iclass
parameter.parameter_description: a #GObjectClass

parameter.name: n_properties
parameter.parameter_description: location to return the number of child properties found

function.return: a newly allocated array of #GParamSpec*. The array must be freed with g_free().

function.name: goo_canvas_pointer_grab
function.description: Attempts to grab the pointer for the given item.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item to grab the pointer for.

parameter.name: event_mask
parameter.parameter_description: the events to receive during the grab.

parameter.name: cursor
parameter.parameter_description: the cursor to display during the grab, or NULL.

parameter.name: time
parameter.parameter_description: the time of the event that lead to the pointer grab. This should come from the relevant #GdkEvent.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_move_child
function.description: Moves a child to a new stack position.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: old_position
parameter.parameter_description: the current position of the child.

parameter.name: new_position
parameter.parameter_description: the new position of the child.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_style
function.description: Sets the model's style, by copying the properties from the given style.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

function.name: goo_canvas_create_cairo_context
function.description: Creates a cairo context, initialized with the default canvas settings.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

function.return: a new cairo context. It should be freed with cairo_destroy().

function.name: goo_canvas_polyline_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: close_path
parameter.parameter_description: if the last point should be connected to the first.

parameter.name: num_points
parameter.parameter_description: the number of points in the polyline.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: the pairs of coordinates for each point in the line, followed by optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_image_new

parameter.name: parent
parameter.parameter_description: the parent item, or %NULL. If a parent is specified, it will assume ownership of the item, and the item will automatically be freed when it is removed from the parent. Otherwise call g_object_unref() to free it.

parameter.name: pixbuf
parameter.parameter_description: the #GdkPixbuf containing the image data, or %NULL.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the image.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the image.

parameter.name: Varargs
parameter.parameter_description: optional pairs of property names and values, and a terminating %NULL.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_find_child
function.description: Attempts to find the given child item with the container's stack.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a container item.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: the child item to find.

function.return: the position of the given @child item, or -1 if it isn't found.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_class_find_child_property
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas item models, specifically layout container item models such as #GooCanvasTableModel.
It finds a child property of a canvas item class by name.

parameter.name: mclass
parameter.parameter_description: a #GObjectClass

parameter.name: property_name
parameter.parameter_description: the name of the child property to find

function.return: the #GParamSpec of the child property or %NULL if @class has no child property with that name.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_style
function.description: Gets the item's style. If the item doesn't have its own style it will return its parent's style.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_remove
function.description:
Removes an item from its parent. If the item is in a canvas it will be removed.
This would normally also result in the item being freed.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_child_property
function.description: Gets a child property of @child.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: child
parameter.parameter_description: a child #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: property_name
parameter.parameter_description: the name of the child property to get.

parameter.name: value
parameter.parameter_description: a location to return the value.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_fill_rule_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard fill rule property.

function.name: goo_canvas_convert_from_item_space
function.description: Converts a coordinate from the given item's coordinate space to the canvas coordinate space, applying all transformation matrices including the item's own transformation matrix, if it has one.

parameter.name: canvas
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvas.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the x coordinate to convert.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: a pointer to the y coordinate to convert.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_copy
function.description: Copies the given #GooCanvasStyle, by copying all of its properties. Though the parent of the new style is left unset.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasStyle.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_set_style
function.description: Sets the item's style, by copying the properties from the given style.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: an item.

parameter.name: style
parameter.parameter_description: a style.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_set_simple_transform
function.description: A convenience function to set the item model's transformation matrix.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: x
parameter.parameter_description: the x coordinate of the origin of the model's coordinate space.

parameter.name: y
parameter.parameter_description: the y coordinate of the origin of the model's coordinate space.

parameter.name: scale
parameter.parameter_description: the scale of the model.

parameter.name: rotation
parameter.parameter_description: the clockwise rotation of the model, in degrees.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_class_install_child_property
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically layout container items such as #GooCanvasTable.
It installs a child property on a canvas item class.

parameter.name: iclass
parameter.parameter_description: a #GObjectClass

parameter.name: property_id
parameter.parameter_description: the id for the property

parameter.name: pspec
parameter.parameter_description: the #GParamSpec for the property

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_requested_height
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas items, specifically layout items such as #GooCanvasTable.
It gets the requested height of a child item, assuming it is allocated the given width. This is useful for text items whose requested height may change depending on the allocated width.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a #GooCanvasItem.

parameter.name: cr
parameter.parameter_description: a cairo context.

parameter.name: width
parameter.parameter_description: the width that the item may be allocated.

function.return: the requested height of the item, given the allocated width, or %-1 if the item doesn't support this method or its height doesn't change when allocated different widths.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_new
function.description: Creates a new #GooCanvasStyle.

function.name: goo_canvas_style_hint_metrics_id
function.description: Unique #GQuark identifier used for the standard hint metrics property.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_get_n_children
function.description: Gets the number of children of the container.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: a container item.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_lower
function.description: Lowers a model in the stacking order.

parameter.name: model
parameter.parameter_description: an item model.

parameter.name: below
parameter.parameter_description: the item model to lower @model below, or %NULL to lower @model to the bottom of the stack.

function.name: goo_canvas_item_model_class_list_child_properties
function.description:
This function is only intended to be used when implementing new canvas item models, specifically layout container item models such as #GooCanvasTableModel.
It returns all child properties of a canvas item class.

parameter.name: mclass
parameter.parameter_description: a #GObjectClass

parameter.name: n_properties
parameter.parameter_description: location to return the number of child properties found

function.return: a newly allocated array of #GParamSpec*. The array must be freed with g_free().

function.name: GooCanvasItemModelSimple
function.description: The sequence of commands describing the clip path of the item, specified as a string using the same syntax as in the <ulink url="http://www.w3.org/Graphics/SVG/">Scalable Vector Graphics (SVG)</ulink> path element.

function.name: GooCanvasItemModel
function.description: Emitted for each child property that has changed. The signal's detail holds the property name.

parameter.name: item
parameter.parameter_description: the item model that received the signal.

parameter.name: pspec
parameter.parameter_description: the #GParamSpec of the changed child property.
